body:
Yesterday, the country was shocked when a bomb exploded inside a passenger bus plying one the busiest major roads in Makati City - it's financial center. As of writing, authorities have announced that 5 passengers are dead with 14 or more injured.

President Benigno Aquino, III has pledged for a speedy investigation of the bombing and has ordered a review of intelligence and public security measures to prevent future terror attacks.

I share today a short sampling of what ordinary Filipinos think of the bombing incident published via their Twitter or Facebook accounts.
